application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Conditions 25 (Standby Generator Testing), 33 (Back-Up Generator Fuel), 34 (Selective Catalytic Reduction), 35 (Testing Regime) and 36 (Emission Reduction Plan) in respect of Phase 1 only as attached to planning permission ref. 38421/APP/2021/4045 dated 25-11-2022 (Redevelopment of the site to deliver data centre campus including: two data centre buildings (Use Class B8); associated energy and electricity infrastructure, buildings, and plant; security gatehouse, systems and enclosures; works to the highway, car parking and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; as well as associated infrastructure, ancillary office use, and associated external works).
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Conditions 25 (Standby Generator Testing), 33 (Back-Up Generator Fuel), 34 (Selective Catalytic Reduction), 35 (Testing Regime) and 36 (Emission Reduction Plan) in respect of Phase 1 only as attached to planning permission ref. 38421/APP/2021/4045 dated 25-11-2022.
